com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FMultiColumnLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FDesktopLayout
          • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FMultiColumnLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FMultiColumnLayout
extends FDesktopLayout
    This is a multi-column window layout. The layout code was mostly refactored from the DragNDrop class.
    Author:
    Uli

    • Method Detail

      • htmlAnchor

        public XMLBuilder.Element htmlAnchor()
        Description copied from class: FComponent
        a component can choose to create its anchor HTML div, span, etc.. tag via this call. If it does, it can be used in a FContainer. This call may ONLY return a single (i.e. non nested) Element. Inner values are provided by render()
        Overrides:
        htmlAnchor in class FComponent

      • render

        public java.lang.String render()
        Description copied from class: FContainer
        draw the HTML anchors of the kids - populate view will be triggered from the page since the components are all registered. The specific implementation should override this method since it only providers a very basic layout
        Overrides:
        render in class FContainer
